root.name: Wingman
root.description: Adventure / visual novel game developed by TamTam and published by Enix in 1983.Originally released for the NEC PC-8801 and other Japanese personal computers. It featured a point-and-click interface, where a cursor is used to interact with on-screen objects, similar to Planet Mephius (1983) and the NES version of Portopia Renzoku Satsujin Jiken (1985).

similar_games.game: Star Arthur Densetsu I: Wakusei Mephius
